"'United'" is a song by British popstar Robbie Williams released as a single in
2000 (in Europe only) as part of Pepsi's "Ask for More" advertising campaign.

The original release includes a remix by English Electronica band Apollo 440.
"United" was also released separately as a promo single and as the additional
songs for the Robbie Williams single "Supreme", released the same year.
